description:
Bar is closed from Wed, Nov 24, 2021 until Fri, Dec 31, 2021
Spa/wellness center is closed from Wed, Nov 24, 2021 until Fri, Dec 31, 2021

Located in Danang, a 7-minute walk from My Khe Beach, Minh Boutique has accommodations with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Among the various facilities are a terrace, a restaurant, as well as a bar. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi.

Selected rooms also offer a kitchen with a fridge, a minibar and a stovetop. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at Minh Boutique can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast.

The area is popular for cycling, and car rental is available at the accommodation.

Song Han Bridge is 1.1 miles from Minh Boutique, while Love Lock Bridge Da Nang is 1.3 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Da Nang International Airport, 3.7 miles from the hotel.
